mapper.select: SELECT md.product_code AS product_code, pi.product_name AS product_name, md.product_color AS product_color, md.order_qy AS req_qy, (md.order_qy - COALESCE(dd.delivery_qy, 0)) AS rest_qy, --잔여량 구하기 md.amount AS price, -- 제품 단가 금액 합계 md.product_color AS product_color, md.unit_price AS unit_price FROM material_order_details md JOIN product_info pi ON (md.product_code = pi.product_code) LEFT JOIN delivery_details dd ON (md.mtril_order_code = dd.order_code) AND (md.product_color = dd.product_color) WHERE md.mtril_order_code = #{orderCode}
